link_desc:
SNMPv2 template for XG series Sophos Firewall

56 static items and 45 triggers + discovered interface items and triggers

It using (linked) default zabbix templates:

  • Template Module Generic SNMPv2 (Temlate Module ICMP Ping)
  • Template Module Interfaces Simple SNMPv2

Necessary MIB:

  • XG-FIREWALL-MIB (link) You have to upload it on monitoring endpoint server or proxy (for CentOS /usr/share/snmp/mib)

Mandatory default macros:

  • {$SNMP_COMMUNITY}

Optional macroses that can be overloaded per device:

  • {$CPU_UTIL_MAX}
  • {$DISK_UTIL_MAX}
  • {$MEMORY_UTIL_MAX}
  • {$SWAP_UTIL_MAX}

Tested on XG210 (FW 17.5.1) with zabbix 4.0.x (Probably can be ported to 3.4 and lower)

P.S. Sophos SNMP tree is very poor, it is best I've found on it

P.P.S On my version of firewall or firmware item "HA mode" is bugged. It's not returning proper value. Hope it will be fixed soon.

P.P.P.S. Feel free to discuss, may be I'll help you, fix or add something
author: Dmitriy Sidorov
